resources.string: HDR is not supported in zsl mode
Only 720P and 480P are supported when HFR is ON
Only 480P are supported when HFR is ON
Only VGA and WVGA are supported when HFR is ON
Only H264 video encoding is supported when HFR is ON
Unsupported video resolution for this encoder type
no ae bracket support by Apps now
Video snapshot size lower than video size. Capping to Video size. Please select a resolution higher or equal to the current video size.
We do not support picture resolution in Low Power Mode. Video size snapshot will be taken. Please select High power mode for picture size.
Only Video size snapshot supported for this resolution.

Turn off the flash when the power is low.
Put name card at the center of screen and press shutter button.
The phone storage is running out of space. Delete some images or other files.
Open USB mass storage. The camera is not yet available.
<<< Please move the phone in one direction. >>>

You can add an infinite number of images.
Click done button to finish capture
"Take a background first, then put another two on it."
Slide the slider to choose the time interval.
You can wake up the phone with a long press of the camera button.
You must select three or more pictures.
Hold up for trajectory by clicking camera.
Enter into camera when screen off
Focus on white paper, then click the button to measure.
Long press the video button to start. Loosen to pause.
"Can't create the project because storage isn't accessible."

Leave at least one picture to compose.

Please select the object you want to remove.
The storage is running out of space.
Keep camera still when shooting in the dark, then draw the desired pattern in the air with a flashlight.
Use tripod when capturing star-picture to make final image clear.
Storage location has been changed to Phone.
Change storage location to SD card?
"Please make sure no other applications occupy the camera, \u0009 or try to restart the phone."
Exit the camera and then click Bluetooth Finder to take pictures.
Double-click the volume button to take pictures when screen off
Can take pictures of more photos with different exposure level
keep the center of arrow on the line
Selected picture not supported, please choose %s pixels picture again.
Teach you how to get a good photo

"\u0009\u0009Galaxy Photoing allows you to shoot the Milky Way that stars are running around through long-time exposure. \u0009\u0009Try to select a bright and starry night and use a tripod while taking photos in a dark environment."

"\u0009\u0009Star Track allows you to shoot the track that stars are running around through long-time exposure. \u0009\u0009Try to select a bright and starry night and use a tripod while taking photos in a dark environment."
"\u0009\u0009Light Painting allows you to shoot the track that light sources are moving through long-time exposure. \u0009\u0009Please taking photos in a dark environment."
"\u0009\u0009Crystal is suitable for you to shoot a static object, which brings you a transparent and exquisite effect. \u0009\u0009Please use a tripod while taking photos."

"\u0009\u0009Electronic Aperture is a kind of aperture priority shooting mode. You can adjust the size of the aperture, and the camera will automatically adjust the shutter speed. \u0009\u0009It is suitable for you to shoot a static landscape, night view, still object or slowly moving object."

"\u0009\u0009Slow Shutter is a kind of slow shutter shooting mode, which allows you to adjust the exposure time. \u0009\u0009It is suitable for you to shoot scenes with insufficient light, animated objects such as human beings, vehicles, rain/snow, misty waves or colorful light track."
Know About Depth of Field Prediction
"\u0009\u0009Depth of Field Prediction marks the sharp contrast part with red lines on the objects with the same DOF. \u0009\u0009The red area is the clearly focused part."
